text:
Table 3 Cancer of the corpus uteri.
FIGOStage
[Tumor confined to the corpus uteri
IAaNo or less than half myometrial invasion
IBaInvasion equal to or more than half of the myometrium
I1aTumor invades cervical stroma, but does not extend beyond the uterusb
IaLocal and/or regional spread of the tumor
IIIAaTumor invades the serosa of the corpus uteri and/or adnexaec
IIIBaVaginal involvement and/orparametrialinvolvement
IICaMetastases to pelvic and/or para-aortic lymph nodesc
IIIC1aPositive pelvic nodes
IIIC2aPositive para-aortic nodes with or without positive pelvic lymph nodes
IVaTumor invades bladder and/or bowel mucosa, and/or distant metastases
IVAaTumorinvasion ofbladder and/orbowel mucosa
IVBaDistant metastasis, including intra-abdominal metastases and/or inguinal nodes)
a Either G1, G2, or G3.b Endocervical glandular involvement only should be considered as Stage I and no longer as Stage II.c Positive cytology has to be reported separately without changing the stage.

I1aTumor invades cervical stroma, but does not extend beyond the uterusb:
ChatGPT_response_0: 在妇科癌症的分期中，属于IAa阶段的是指肿瘤局限在子宫体内且未侵犯半个子宫肌层或更多；属于IBa阶段的是指肿瘤侵犯了半个或更多子宫肌层；而属于I1a阶段的是指肿瘤侵犯了宫颈间质，但未延伸至子宫以外。这些是根据肿瘤在子宫内的扩散和侵犯程度进行分类的，有助于医生更好地评估疾病的严重程度和选择治疗方案。在治疗过程中，及早分期可以帮助医生制定最合适的个体化治疗方案，提高疾病治疗的效果和预后。
query: 在妇科癌症分期中，什么情况下属于IAa、IBa和I1a？

response: 在妇科癌症的分期中，属于IAa阶段的是指肿瘤局限在子宫体内且未侵犯半个子宫肌层或更多；属于IBa阶段的是指肿瘤侵犯了半个或更多子宫肌层；而属于I1a阶段的是指肿瘤侵犯了宫颈间质，但未延伸至子宫以外。这些是根据肿瘤在子宫内的扩散和侵犯程度进行分类的，有助于医生更好地评估疾病的严重程度和选择治疗方案。在治疗过程中，及早分期可以帮助医生制定最合适的个体化治疗方案，提高疾病治疗的效果和预后。
